    • Uses of Solution in org.jamesframework.core.problems.constraints

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Constraint<SolutionType extends Solution,DataType>
      Interface of a constraint that can be imposed on the solutions, based on underlying data.
      interface  PenalizingConstraint<SolutionType extends Solution,DataType>
      Interface of a penalizing constraint, which assigns a certain penalty to a solution which does not satisfy the constraint.

      boolean SubsetSolution.isSameSolution(Solution sol)
